speech:
Welcome to Covid 19 Chatbot for India.

Reply with corresponding codes to view more information:

1.View myths-reply with *myths*.

2.Frequently asked questions-reply with *faq*.

3.Symptom check-reply with *check*.

4.View statewise hospitals list-reply with *hosp*.

5.View statewise testing center list-reply with *test*.

6.Prevention-reply with *prevent*.

7.Plasma donation/Enquiry-reply with *plasma*

8.Donate to Ngo-reply with *donate*

9.To view helpline number-reply with *helplines*

10.To view the creators behind this project-reply with *creators*

11.To view latest Announcements - reply with *announcements*

12.Symptoms Check-reply with *symptoms*.

13.View current case count- reply with *tracker*.


To view this menu at any point during the conversation reply with *Menu*

To stop/deactivate the project reply with *Stop*.
